name: Jewels Puzzle Switch
description:
This time Bigcode games came up with a classic matching jewel game in the pirate theme. Be ready to tease your brain by helping our hero in this puzzle game to find out the precious gems and stones. It is so simple: just swap gems to match three or more and make waves of enthusiasm and sparkling effects!

In Jewels Puzzle Switch - match luminous gems across 200 sprawling levels. Finish each level to travel through the mesmerising world of precious glitter with the pirate guy. Collect as many as treasures, by facing all the hindrance such Rope Jail, Monster Locker and Glossy Shields. Make your path clear by cutting down the woody plates. Use more Pirate's Bomb, Heavenly Cross and Trinket Shovel to finish targets in harder levels. In Jewel games, remember to use Precious Star for more jewel magic’s on the screen!

Features of game:
• Fun match 3 game play
• 200+ levels
• Easy to play interface, Just swap & match.
• stunning design and effects

Download and play Jewels Puzzle Switch to explore the glittering world of gems and stones with your Hero, for free today from Puzzle Games category!
